review: Great product!!! I would give it 20 stars if i could
author: jarod

review: I love the ease at which it connected right out of the box.  It was preloaded with my account information, just had to connect to my wireless.  Navigation is easy and remote is quite functional.
author: Dennis R. Ing "rhone ranger"

review: I have the Apple TV and a Chromecast, this device leaves them in the dust. It's quality is just as good as my Apple TV. With the remote control app and voice search it wins by a mile. Figure in the fact that this is 60 bucks cheaper and I'm amazed. This is really a great product.
author: Jerial Knight

review: I got this fire stick to watch You Tube videos i  my sewing room. Works Great but im super impressed about how much more is available ! Great buy for 40 bucks !!
author: Lady Fab

review: So far the stick has been working great, easy set up, wish it had more old school Kung fu flixs..bt a great buy for the price...
author: DAVID REED

review: and was super easy to get up & running, you can use an app for voice commands if preferred over the remote... Either way, this device is great.
author: pegs
